entry.title: To be completed -> Power, fluence, waist and other beam parameters

link.title: To be completed -> Power, fluence, waist and other beam parameters

entry.content: A brief post expliciting how power, beam diameter, pulse duration and repetition rate are related. This is available elsewhere on the web but I wanted to write a short version which I can easily find and understand. To be updated
entry.summary: Beam diameter, power, repetition rate, pulse duration, fluence and power
